results.title: Novel PIK3R1 gene mutation associated with SHORT syndrome: a case report of a 15-year-old female.
results.text_hl: Genetic testing identified a novel @GENE_PIK3R1 @GENE_5295 @@@PIK3R1@@@ gene mutation. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ significantly improved her glycemic control and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profiles.

citations.NLM: Osman A, Morsi A, El-Refee S, Suliman S. Novel PIK3R1 gene mutation associated with SHORT syndrome: a case report of a 15-year-old female. J Pediatr Endocrinol Metab. 2024 Sep 12;():. PMID: 39258502
